title: Moving big trees
subject_group: Climate, Environment, Natural Resources & Disasters/Tree planting
Climate, Environment, Natural Resources & Disasters/Conservation of natural resources

description: The Civic Trust (London) works to redress the loss of trees (generally due to urbanization and other development) by cheap and simple means. Describes the process from selection and preparation of trees to relocation.
